findings.rationale: Obligations continuing in perpetuity can lead to indefinite liability and uncertainty for both parties, potentially resulting in long-term legal and financial implications.
findings.evidence_quote: The obligations under this Agreement shall continue in perpetuity and shall survive any termination of discussions between the parties.

findings.rationale: Indemnification without limits can expose a party to significant financial risk in the event of a breach, as it may lead to substantial claims and liabilities.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party shall indemnify and hold harmless the other party from and against all claims, losses, damages, and expenses, without limit, arising out of any breach of this Agreement.

findings.rationale: A limitation of liability clause that states neither party's liability shall be limited can result in unbounded financial exposure in case of legal claims.
findings.evidence_quote: Notwithstanding any other provision, neither party's liability shall be limited under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The automatic assignment of rights to Company A for all work products may limit the receiving party's ability to utilize their own contributions in future projects.
findings.evidence_quote: The receiving party hereby assigns all right, title, and interest in such work product.

findings.rationale: The clause allowing recovery of attorneys' fees can discourage parties from pursuing legitimate disputes due to fear of incurring additional costs.
findings.evidence_quote: The prevailing party in any dispute shall be entitled to recover all attorneys' fees and costs from the non-prevailing party.
